mapper.select: SELECT prdNo, prdName,prdPrice,prdVolume,prdCompany,prdMainCate,prdSubCate,prdImg,prdDesc FROM PRODUCT WHERE prdNo=#{prdNo}
SELECT PI_NO as piNo, PRD_NO as prdNo, PI_URL as piUrl, PI_TYPE as piType, PI_SORT as piSort FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE PRD_NO = #{prdNo} ORDER BY PI_SORT ASC
SELECT prdSubCate, count(*) cnt FROM VIEWED_PRODUCT WHERE userNo = #{user_no} GROUP BY prdSubCate ORDER BY cnt DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.*, r.AVG_STAR AS avgRating, DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE AS randomSort FROM PRODUCT p JOIN ( SELECT PRDNO, AVG(REVSTAR) AS AVG_STAR FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRDNO ) r ON p.PRDNO = r.PRDNO WHERE r.AVG_STAR >= 3.0 ) ORDER BY randomSort FETCH FIRST ${limit} ROWS ONLY
